item.title: KFin Technologies Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: KFin Technologies Ltd (KFINTECH) has witnessed a notable 10.8% increase in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite a modest 0.91% gain in the stock price, the surge in OI alongside volume patterns and technical indicators suggests a complex interplay of bullish and cautious sentiment among traders. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Indian Energy Exchange Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Momentum
item.description: Indian Energy Exchange Ltd (IEX) has witnessed a notable 10.46% increase in open interest in its derivatives segment, rising from 43,156 to 47,668 contracts. Time: 11 minutes ago

item.title: Akme Fintrade (India) Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Akme Fintrade (India) Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Non Banking Financial Company (NBFC) sector, witnessed intense selling pressure on 2 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit price limit and recording a new 52-week and all-time low of ₹3.92. The stock’s sharp decline reflects mounting investor concerns amid deteriorating fundamentals and persistent bearish momentum. Time: 11 minutes ago
